title: Save up to 35% with the Soundcore Life Q30 Headphones!
description: Get them for a much lower price on Black Friday. The post Save up to 35% with the Soundcore Life Q30 Headphones! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Get them for a much lower price on Black Friday.
text: As far as affordable audio hardware is concerned, Anker’s Soundcore brand is one of the better choices on the market right now. With that in mind, folks after a great-sounding pair of wireless headphones might want to check out the Soundcore Life Q30 headphones, which are on sale right now with this Black Friday deal. As for specs, the Soundcore Life Q30 headphones come with all the essentials, including active noise cancelling and transparency modes, customizable sound profiles via a dedicated app, multipoint Bluetooth connectivity, as well as up to 40 hours of playtime on a single charge. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
As far as affordable audio hardware is concerned, Anker’s Soundcore brand is one of the better choices on the market right now. With that in mind, folks after a great-sounding pair of wireless headphones might want to check out the Soundcore Life Q30 headphones, which are on sale right now with this Black Friday deal.

As for specs, the Soundcore Life Q30 headphones come with all the essentials, including active noise cancelling and transparency modes, customizable sound profiles via a dedicated app, multipoint Bluetooth connectivity, as well as up to 40 hours of playtime on a single charge.
